attributes.action: Prevent a further increase in University Tuition Fees and a decrease in Grants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Students need more support rather than entering the working world with even more debt in which they will spend their first ten years or so paying back their loan. If this plan to increase tuition fees does go ahead this will greatly affect the number of students who apply for university, especially working class students.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
